cups.name: Four of Cups
cups.reversed: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment

cups.name: Six of Cups
cups.upright: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy
cups.reversed: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness

cups.name: Seven of Cups
cups.reversed: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices

cups.name: Eight of Cups
cups.reversed: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting

cups.name: Nine of Cups
cups.upright: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish come true
cups.reversed: Lack of inner joy, smugness, dissatisfaction

cups.name: Ten of Cups
cups.upright: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment
cups.reversed: Misalignment of values, broken home or family disputes

cups.name: Page of Cups
cups.upright: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility
cups.reversed: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks, emotional immaturity

cups.name: Queen of Cups
cups.upright: Compassionate, caring, emotionally stable, intuitive, in flow

cups.name: King of Cups
cups.reversed: Self-compassion, inner feelings, moodiness, emotionally manipulative
